name: tm13
effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Snore)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Fires an icy cold
beam that may
freeze the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Fires an icy cold
beam that may
freeze the foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is struck
with an icy beam.
It may freeze the
foe solid.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is struck with an icy-cold
beam of energy. It may also freeze
the target solid.

The foe is struck with an icy-cold
beam of energy. It may also freeze
the target solid.

The foe is struck with an icy-cold
beam of energy. It may also freeze
the target solid.

The target is struck with an icy-cold

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break
barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex
of fire that rages for four to five turns.
